name: get_all_details
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube_video_stream_download.
Tool description: Get Download Youtube Audio/Video/Captions/shorts Link & stream
API description: Fetches all details of a YouTube video, stream, or shorts including captions, audio-only files, video-only files, and stream URL if available.

is_id.description: The unique ID of the YouTube video/stream/shorts.
